title: Evidence-Based Psychological Intervention Design: Technology-Social Balance Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Blended online/offline instruction using digital devices, emphasizing evidence-based intervention design that balances social interaction and technology tools

learning_goals: Learners can design evidence-based psychological interventions based on a technology-society balance approach.
Learners apply methods to measure and analyze intervention effectiveness using digital tools (e.g., LMS, survey platforms).
Learners can evaluate and improve the social validity of intervention designs through peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
